segments.text: Excuse me , is this the office of the Textile Corporation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm from CTC Trade Company . Here is my card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Welcome to our corporation . I'm in charge of the export business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad to meet you here . You're Ms . ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm In Hui . Do sit down , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Ms . In . I'm here to discuss the possibility of establishing business relations with your corporation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd be very glad to do so . Have you seen the exhibits displayed in the hall ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I had a look around yesterday . I wish I could have them all . Can you give me a price list with specifications ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . If you make an inquiry , we can make you a firm offer .
segments.speaker: S2
